titles.title: Allowing for the Safe Return of Rohingyas to Burma Act of 2019
Allowing for the Safe Return of Rohingyas to Burma Act of 2019
To direct the President to withdraw the application of the duty-free treatment with respect to Burma under the Generalized System of Preferences program, and for other purposes.
Allowing for the Safe Return of Rohingyas to Burma Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
